--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 6/4/03 6:49:40 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > OOC: URGH!  What is it with people always having to blitz-post 
around 
> > here?  I thought there was an agreement to put a lid on it!  
Maybe I 
> > should leave after all - certainly there's no shortage of other 
RPG's 
> > that actually respect members who can't be online 24-7!!!!!!
> > 
> > 
> 
> Sorry.. my bad...  
> 
> Stac

This isn't the first time either - and there shouldn't have BEEN a 
first time, let alone a second or third, or whatever the count's made 
it up to now.  You're not the only one, Stac; Airly, Raccoon (when 
she's on), and Robo are all guilty.  I know I've missed a few people, 
but you guys are the worst culprits.  Sorry if it looks like I'm 
overreacting, but there's just no excuse for this.  If every 
character was involved in something, I could imagine having to read a 
page and a half of entries, but this is ridiculous.

No excuse.  Period.
